titles.title: CMVâ€“22 Reliability and Readiness Enhancement Act
CMVâ€“22 Reliability and Readiness Enhancement Act

A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Navy to integrate nacelle improvement modifications into the CMV-22 aircraft fleet to improve readiness and reliability and sustain the tiltrotor industrial base, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
